text: Rodela may refer to: *Rodela, a type of round shield similar to a buckler, used by Rodeleros ==People with the surname== *David Rodela (born 1982), American boxer *Jose Rodela (born 1937), United States Army soldier and Medal of Honor recipient ==See also== *Cova Rodela, a village of Brava, Cape Verde *Rodelas, a municipality in Bahia, Brazil
title: Rodela
